section.section: Within 15 days after an employer prepares or revises a chemical information list, the employer shall submit a copy of the list to the Department of the Environment.

Within 5 working days after an employer receives a written request from the Department of the Environment for a copy of a material safety data sheet, the employer shall submit to the Department a copy of that sheet.

text.section:
The Department of the Environment shall:
review, for completeness and sufficiency, each:
chemical information list that an employer submits under subsection (a) of this section; and
material safety data sheet that the Department requests; and
give the Commissioner notice of any noncompliance.

Except as provided in subsections (b) and (c) of this section and § 6-503 of the Environment Article, the Department of the Environment:
shall treat as confidential information in a chemical information list; and
may not disclose the information:
in any civil proceeding; or
to any person.
